website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Velocity is highly lauded for its stylish facade. However, there’s more to it than meets the eye. This running spike from Saucony is equipped with lightweight materials, support, comfort, and accurate fit. Boasting versatility as its masterpiece, the Saucony Velocity is suited for multiple track and field events, yielding optimal performance.
pros: Many admire the lightness of the Saucony Velocity
According to several purchasers, it is very comfortable
It helps enhance speed, remarked quite a few runners
Several appreciate the durability of the track shoe
It offers great support, noted a few athletes
Some claim that the track spike fits perfectly
cons: The Velocity feels a little too tight, commented a few users
Some of the purchasers have complained about the shoe’s lack of grip

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, Excellent Price & Return Policy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my son who runs Cross Country & long distance track & field. Very Light... They seem to be well built for their purpose. These shoes changed my son's preference from New Balance To Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome track shoes!! Somebody ended up stealing my son's original pair so we checked out amazon and came across these. He really loved the look of them. They are really really bright! After reading reviews I did order him a half size bigger which fit him perfectly! So I highly suggest ordering a bit bigger! They have held up through this track season really well. They are nicely made!
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great 7th grade track season
customer_reviews.text: bought for mid distances... 400/800 and 1600; shoes held up nicely and contributed to undefeated 800m season 2d year in a row
customer_reviews.author: duncan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable for training. USATF Masters Track & Field Athlete 100m/200m/400m
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Paul

customer_reviews.title: Consider your size carefully but not bad
customer_reviews.text: Not the worst, not the best. They are ok for the price but were smaller than expected. Not worth the time or hassle to send them back, so my son will have to keep them but he won't be able to wear them long because of the fit which is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: g3y9

customer_reviews.title: These spikes were a great value and a perfect shoe for my versatile high ...
customer_reviews.text: These spikes were a great value and a perfect shoe for my versatile high school, mid distance runner and hurdler. He loves them. I don't know how they compare to the more top of the line track spikes, but I feel these are a great value. We bough them a half size smaller than his normal shoe size but these fit a bit small even for that, maybe by an extra half size. They fit nice and snug, but about how I think he likes them anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Ainslie

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. I feel like I can sprint faster and ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. I feel like I can sprint faster and with better form and I feel like I can run longer. I have Tailors Bunion so I do get discomfort from my fifth metatarsal/joint smashing into the hard plastic that wraps up from the bottom of the shoe (on the outerside of the shoe). But I just power through the discomfort and don't feel it when sprinting.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: He says they are awesome. Our only complaint is that the tool for ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my son who runs 1/2-mile and mile in middle school track. He wears size 12, but we ordered a12.5, and they worked out perfectly. He says they are awesome. Our only complaint is that the tool for tightening the cleats stripped out a little after tightening the first cleat, making it difficult to do the rest. He has only worn them for a few practices and one meet, so I can't say how well the hold up yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rayanne Lanowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my son who is a distance runner in track. He wore them last year too. Perfect. Offers just enough support to still do a distance run in spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Halla

customer_reviews.title: ... hoping for so it turned out to be a perfect online purchase
customer_reviews.text: They do exactly what I expected them to do and fit exactly as I was hoping for so it turned out to be a perfect online purchase...thanks
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: and he is very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who runs 8th grade track, and he is very happy with them. His foot is a little wide, so I was pleased to see they are working for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product at great price!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly to Alaska and was well packaged. Ordered for 14 year old son who really enjoys them and feels they have helped his performance on the track. Fit true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani

customer_reviews.title: Nice Spikes
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old wore these for track and was thrilled with them - said they fit very nice and were perfect to run in.
customer_reviews.author: JamesMarie

customer_reviews.title: buy at least one size larger. if you want ...
customer_reviews.text: buy at least one size larger. if you want to wear socks it will not fit if you buy your regular size. there are narrow shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nolefan

customer_reviews.title: On the mark.
customer_reviews.text: My 10th grade son wears them for sprinting, he does the 100 200 and 400 they are light weight stylish and have enhanced his performance.
customer_reviews.author: Nevets

customer_reviews.title: good for track
customer_reviews.text: good for track, might not work as well for cross country. bottom fewer spikes than other spikes and not much grip on heal of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son. He liked them and received a lot of compliments. The yellow is very bright and they really stand out.
customer_reviews.author: Karres

customer_reviews.title: ... my son he does mostly field events they fit great comfortable he loves them
customer_reviews.text: They were for my son he does mostly field events they fit great comfortable he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: The shoe is a great value, with great performance during his track meets
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product as a gift for my son for track. The shoe is a great value, with great performance during his track meets.
customer_reviews.author: clarence

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I got these shoes for my son. He is on his high school track team and he says that they have really helped him improve in his running events. He says they are very comfortable and have gotten compliments on the look. It's a great shoe for the price. This was a real bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Chasity Hill

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to buy shoes online for a still-growing teenager
customer_reviews.text: We needed a reasonably priced track shoe and these filled the bill. I don't like to buy shoes online for a still-growing teenager, but the fit was pretty true to what we expected. He was able to wear them all day at his track meets.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Z

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit a little smaller than I like. But still a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it worked well for my son to run in for track
customer_reviews.author: Deatrice Halley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is for my 14 year old son's track & field. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Naoko McGlothlen

customer_reviews.title: Great Looking Shoe, Very Light Weight
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son who runs 200 meters on his middle school track team. He loves the color of the shoe and he said the shoe was comfortable. I did buy a half size bigger than his normal size to allow for his socks and a comfortable fit and he does have room at the toe of his shoe so I think his normal shoe size would have been fine. He has a track meet today and we will see how well they feel on the track. If they don't perform to standard I'll update my post.
customer_reviews.author: smbeth

customer_reviews.title: He loves them and I think they're a great value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who is in college and runs track. He loves them and I think they're a great value.
customer_reviews.author: L.M.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I love them so much I have several pairs.
customer_reviews.author: J Deyarman

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoe - just as expected!
customer_reviews.text: ordered 1/2 larger as others suggested on the review. My son on HS Varsity track team and he really likes them, although has only used them a week so far, but is happy and that makes this a good purchase for me. Used the free 2-day shipping for Amazon's trial Prime membership - free.
customer_reviews.author: Pete P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good track shoes for the price. As others have noted they tend to run a bit small.
customer_reviews.author: JP Ronan

customer_reviews.title: Narrow
customer_reviews.text: A little bit narrow and tight but my son seems to like them
customer_reviews.author: Amy Larsen

customer_reviews.title: but they work great for me as training spikes
customer_reviews.text: After raced in them yet, but they work great for me as training spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The only track shoe my son will wear. I saved money buying then through amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son loved the pair I ordered for him
customer_reviews.text: My son loved the pair I ordered for him. It fit him perfectly and he said it was very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mojaeco

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, spikes were too long
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe! The only problem we had was that the spikes that came with it were too long for the tracks that they were going to be used on. That wasn't something we thought to check on, so I don't know if the spike length was declared in the description and we just missed it - or if it wasn't there at all. But, the coach had extras of the correct length, so we just used those.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: LIght but not durable...
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well, but they have not been very durable. We bought these for my 15 year old son. He runs the 800 m, and one other relay. In less than a month the shoes developed holes on the side where they flex during the race. Saucony is a great running brand, and I expected better from their product. However, they only need to last one more month.... then we'll shop for a more durable brand for next season.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline M. Walby

customer_reviews.title: but fits great.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are as expected. Had to order one size up, but fits great.
customer_reviews.author: D H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent spikes for the $$!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great track spike for the $$. These can cost upwards of $70 at Dicks or Sports Authority. Half the price here at Amazon! This is my son's second pair of Saucony spikes, and they fit well, are super light and have all the right features. He's a huge fan of the crazy neon color choices. He was second place on his middle school track team last year and is hoping to push for first this year.
customer_reviews.author: A. McGann

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 14 year old son he says he like everything about them
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my 14 year old son he says he like everything about them
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Plasencia

customer_reviews.title: a good one for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: My son likes the shoe, a good one for the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow Can not wear. Is fo a very slim feets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He said they felt like socks and he loved them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 13 yr old. He said they felt like socks and he loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Rossy Barzola

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The size was fitted as expected, light in weight , sharp in color, value for money, I love it !
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: The Turn up Saucony :)
customer_reviews.text: Simple to say lol :) Good grip, comfortable, perfect for speed. When I first ran in them I couldn't stop running lol
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Harris

customer_reviews.title: ... for grandson runs 100 meter and relays times were better he really likes shoes satisfied with looks and
customer_reviews.text: Bought for grandson runs 100 meter and relays times were better he really likes shoes satisfied with looks and price
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: He did not like the hard material that the soles were made with
customer_reviews.text: I returned these shoes. My son is on his school's cross country team. He did not like the hard material that the soles were made with. They would not work to wear on hard surfaces without the spikes as he did with the Brooks spikes that he had the year before.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen A. Francis

customer_reviews.title: Way to narrow a shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered Saucony shoes before and have raved about the fit. This pair that I received yesterday are so incredibly narrow that I almost think it is a defective pair. I intend to return them. Not at all a 12 medium. More like a 12 micro-narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Phiber

product_meta.title: SAUCONY VELOCITY SPIKE MENS - UK 10.5, GREY/ORANGE
product_meta.description: Lightly padded tongue and collar for added comfort. Soft fabric lining for a great in-shoe feel. Molded insole supplies light underfoot cushioning. Die-cut EVA midsole helps attenuate impacting shock over middle to long distances. XT-900â" carbon rubber outsole material delivers exceptional traction and long-lasting wear. Imported.
feature_bullets: Achieve maximum velocity as you dig into the track with seven-spike tenacity in this highly breathable, lightweight shoe from Saucony.
